org.mongodb.morphia.aggregation

Class Projection<T,U>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mongodb.morphia.aggregation.Projection<T,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the source type
    U - the target type

    public final class Projection<T,U>
extends Object
    Defines a projection for use in aggregation
    MongoDB documentation
    $project
